ComicInfo.Title: Cobra Nation, Part 1
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Cobra Nation, Part 1: Cobra Commander meets Dawn Moreno, a Springfield teenager who is unusually physically adept. Zartan's allies strike against Cobra Commander, using Crystal Ball's hypnosis to mesmerize the people of Springfield through their television sets while Zartan issues orders to them in Cobra Commander's guise. Destro, now wearing cybernetic hands to replace those he lost, confronts Cobra Commander and prepares to kill him.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 01:33:25. [CVDB518746] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:39:43. [Issue ID 1542719]
